body.p: This Basis for Conclusions summarises the joint considerations of the International Accounting Standards Board (IASB) and the US national standard-setter, the Financial Accounting Standards Board (FASB), in reaching the conclusions in their standards, IFRS 15 Revenue from Contracts with Customers and Topic 606, which is introduced into the FASB Accounting Standards Codification® by the Accounting Standards Update 2014‑09 Revenue from Contracts with Customers. It includes the reasons for accepting particular views and rejecting others. Individual Board members gave greater weight to some factors than to others.
